name: Digital Booth Rentals
description: With its sleek design, the digital booth packs a truly modern photo booth experience into a tiny footprint. Beyond traditional photos, the digital booth can take GIFs, boomerangs, and videos so you can turn your digital booth rental into a GIF booth rental, boomerang booth rental - or even enable all of them at once! Complete with built in sharing tools, sharing your photos has never been easier. Send your favorite snaps via text, email and airdrop with the push of a button and relive your favorite moments.

videoHero.heading: Picture Perfect Fun
videoHero.subtitle: Unforgettable Moments with our Digital Photo Booth

marketingInfo.title: Digital Booth Rentals
marketingInfo.description: With its sleek design, the digital booth packs a truly modern photo booth experience into a tiny footprint. Beyond traditional photos, the digital booth can take GIFs, boomerangs, and videos so you can turn your digital booth rental into a GIF booth rental, boomerang booth rental - or even enable all of them at once! Complete with built in sharing tools, sharing your photos has never been easier. Send your favorite snaps via text, email and airdrop with the push of a button and relive your favorite moments.

marketingInfo.title: Photo, GIFs, Boomerangs and Videos
marketingInfo.description: Can't decide what kind of booth you want for your event? Don't! With our digital photo booth rental you get a GIF booth, Boomerang booth, video booth all in one!

marketingInfo.title: Social Media Sharing
marketingInfo.description: Participants can send selfies, group photos, GIFs, and videos to themselves or their friends in seconds. The digital booth texts, emails and airdrops post-ready files so guests can post to any social media platform with the click of a button.

marketingInfo.title: Customizable Booth Rental
marketingInfo.description: Make the digital booth yours, from the booth features to the content your guests create. Change the start screen to reflect the vibe of your event or send a custom message with each photo share. Looking for a GIF booth rental or boomerang booth rental? Enable these features and let your guests decide how they want to capture the moment.

boothFeatures.includedFeaturesDescription: The Following Features Are Included In Our Digital Booth Packages

name: Premium Photo Booth
description: Our open-air photo booth provides everything you need to have the most powerful tower photo booth rental experience possible. Choose from our wide variety of backdrops, let us design your custom photo template, and enjoy our carefully chosen props. It is, without a doubt, the best selfie station you could hope for.

videoHero.heading: Unforgettable Prints
videoHero.subtitle: Transform Your Event with our Premium Photo Booth

marketingInfo.title: Premium Photo Booth
marketingInfo.description: Our open-air photo booth provides everything you need to have the most powerful tower photo booth rental experience possible. Choose from our wide variety of backdrops, let us design your custom photo template, and enjoy our carefully chosen props. It is, without a doubt, the best selfie station you could hope for.

marketingInfo.title: Open-Air Photo Booth Rentals
marketingInfo.description: Sick of low-quality photo booth equipment? Our top-of-the-line equipment will raise the bar at your event, complementing any venue. Furthermore, our easy-to-use software will let guests enjoy the age-old concept of instant photos AND enjoy an animated GIF booth rental, all-in-one.

marketingInfo.title: Party Photo Booth Rentals
marketingInfo.description: Our powerful photo booth software makes it easy for your guests to email and text their favorite photos to themselves. As long as their is reliable internet at your venue, we include this at no additional cost, every time.

marketingInfo.title: Social Media Sharing
marketingInfo.description: After your event, we will send you a link to all of the printed collages as well as the original photos. These make great assets for any branding photo booth, and even better memories if you're looking for a wedding photo booth rental.

boothFeatures.includedFeaturesDescription: The Following Features Are Included In Our Premium Photo Booth Packages

videoHero.heading: Mirror, Pose, Share
videoHero.subtitle: Create Magical Memories with our Interactive Photo Booth

marketingInfo.title: magic-mirror-photo-booth
marketingInfo.description: Your guests will love personalizing their photo with a signature. With this built-in feature, the magic mirror photo booth rental allows your guests to draw or sign directly on the mirror. Their creation is then printed on the photo.

marketingInfo.title: Text and Email Photo Sharing
marketingInfo.description: With the selfie mirror photo booth rental, participants can send selfies, GIFs, and videos in seconds. The magic mirror texts and emails from it's massive animated touch screen.

marketingInfo.title: Customizable Animations
marketingInfo.description: The magic selfie mirror photo booth rental is fully customizable for your event. We can add custom graphics, enable interactive games, create motion triggered animations, enable photo filters, and even add a scream contest! Corporate Event? The Mirror Booth has several branding opportunities and can even do lead capture.

marketingInfo.description: After your event, we will send you a link to all of the printed collages as well as the original photos. These make great assets for any branding photo booth, and even better memories if you're looking for a wedding photo booth rental.
